import sys

def main() :
    lines = sys.stdin.readlines()
    cases = int(lines[0])
    count = 1
    for case in xrange(cases) :
        num = int(lines[count])
        count = count + 1
        A = [1] * (num+1)
        for i in xrange(3,num+1) :
            s = 0
            for j in xrange(1,i) :
                s = s + A[j] * A[i-j]
            s = s % 10000
            A[i] = s
        print A[num]

main()
